case_title: SHAH JEHAN vs DEPUTY INSPECTOR-GENERAL OF POLICE, QUETTA

adverse_remarks.general_remarks: Instead of improvement, he has rather deteriorated.

appellant.claim: Performance was excellent during the period.
appellant.evidence: Recommended for commendation certificate by SSP Police Quetta on 22-2-1989.

respondent.claim: Performance was a result of team effort, not individual contribution.
respondent.remarks: Appellant indulged in 'unwanted activities' without substantiated evidence.

tribunal_findings.remarks: Adverse remarks passed without material evidence.
